resources.string: Use system backlight value on start
If checked - KR will use system\'s backlight value at start, otherwise - use it\'s own
Set the backlight brightness as in the system
Scan properties of all books in directory
(Slows down the reaction time to single taps)
Selection mode is on. Select text using touch screen.
Inspector mode is on. Select text using touch screen.
Defining two dictionaries allows quickly switch between them when you need to translate word or phrase in more than one dictionary
More than 2 dictionary can be used in different modes - selection, page inspector, etc...
Simple (no ligatures, kerning may not work)
Long double tap is an action, that fires when you doubletapping the word but hold a finger on the second tap more than 400ms.
You can define quick action to send your bookmark to external app
Book has been downloaded from OPDS:
Click cover to download the book
Click cover to open the book
First you should download the book
This option is for currently opened book
This option will be default for new books
Translation direction works for SOME dictionaries, e.g. online, ABBYY, etc
User dic entry has been created
It may take several minutes to finish
Cool Reader is free and will always be free. If you want to support development of this project, you can buy donation package from Android Market.
Maximum group size in file browser
If the number is greater - items will be grouped into subfolders
This option will enable filling reading area with black color every N pages
Time (in ms) the black filled area will be shown
This device has E-Ink screen (when not autodetected)
You can force set E-Ink settings, when it was now detected by KnownReader. You must close and reopen options dialog when changing this value - to see these options
Set proxy to 127.0.0.1:8118 for onion links
Set custom icons color (only modern icons)
Do you really want to delete this catalog / library ?
Do you really want to remove this book from recent list?
Do you really want to delete this book / archive ?
Do you really want to delete this folder along with all the books?
Cool Reader is free and will always be free. If you want to support development of this project, you can make donation using Android Market in-app purchase:

This fork of Cool Reader is free and maintained by plotn 4pda user. If you want to support development of this project, you can make donation - contact me (by login \'plotn\') at 4pda forum in QMS mesages.
Do you really want to delete this bookmark?
Auto set TTS language by the language of the document
TTS engine \"%s\" init failure, disabling it…
Account balance is too low to purchase this book.\nDo you want to refill your account balance?\nLink with account refill page will be opened in external browser.
Error occurred while trying to login.
Error occurred while trying to register new account.
If you don\'t use email as login, you can specify your email here.
If you are using email as login or specified email in separate field and subscribed on updates, you will get 10 books for free.
Do you want to purchase this book?

WARNING: To support fullscreen mode and dimming of softkeys on Android 3 and 4, target Android version has been changed to Android 4. In this mode legacy Menu soft button is not available anymore. Without reader toolbar, in reading mode you can open menu by tapping at center of screen. Long tap at center of screen shows settings dialog. Turn on toolbar in reading mode now? (You can always change this option in Settings/Page/Toolbar)
CoolReader settings found. Do you want to copy CoolReader\'s settings into KnownReader?

Added the function of saving the program log. If during the execution of any operation the program terminates abnormally or does not work correctly, you can create a log file. If the program terminated with an error, you need to start it again and select the "Save log" item in the reading menu. A log file will be generated to help resolve the issue.
Cannot add this URL since it is added to black list of catalogs which may violate DMCA by request of LitRes.ru
WARNING: this URL is added to black list of catalogs which may violate DMCA by request of LitRes.ru Do you really want to add this catalog?
Document opened from stream, file location unknown. Unable to save information about the last opened file!
Stop reading aloud on motion sensor timeout
Save cr3.ini file to cloud storage at KnownReader settings folder
Restore settings from file cr3.ini located in KnownReader settings folder on cloud storage
Next dictionary will be the 2nd for one time
Save reading position to cloud storage
Restore reading pos from cloud storage
Autosave reading pos to cloud storage timeout
Autosave reading pos timeout (when TTS is activated)
Save opened book to this folder
This option allows you to correct shortened words, before it will be sent to dictionary application, e.g. when you select \"l\'homme\" - it will be transformed to \"homme\", etc.
Toggle dictionary button action - short/long tap
There are two different actions on a \'dictionary\' button on \'selection toolbar\' (when you select text while reading) - fired by short and long taps. This option allows to swap them.
User dictionary is a small panel under book page that shows up to 10 words (that were saved before with its translations), containing on the current page
Use | for unnessary ending, ~ for split variants of the word
extension org.coolreader.docx is not installed, install it to open docx format
Opened previously converted copy of document
KnownReader could try to convert document in html format, then open it. Proceed?
Selected directory is not empty. Delete content? Files/folders count:
This is not a file system folder
Both (toolbar and more), in the beginning
If necessary, allows you to select a language other than the language installed in the system (System is selected by default)
Selecting the appearance of the menu and settings from several options (Black, White, Dark, Light, etc.)
Allows you not to refresh the page completely (when open dialogs, keyboard, etc) to avoid text reformatting
Forcing the screen backlight time 2-6 minutes, or according to the system settings (selected by default)
Forcing the screen brightness to be set to 1-100%, or according to the system settings (selected by default)
For E-Ink with double frontlight (currently only Onyx)
If the motion sensor does not fix the activity, then the reading aloud stops after a selected time period of 1-100 minutes, disabled by default
Forced off the backlight of control buttons (if there are separate ones) for more comfortable reading
Display of icons before menu items (when disabled - just title)
Show book covers along with titles
Selecting the display size of the book cover (Small, Medium, Large)
Retrieve information about books in the selected folder (author, genre, year of publication, etc.)
Hide folders that do not contain books (may slow down the listing of directory contents)
This option disables the display of covers and other information of books in folders
The reading position will be saved every 1-100 minutes on the cloud storage, disabled by default (requires account permission for access)
The reading position will be saved to local file on this device
Assign actions for buttons and behavior when connecting a headset
Customize the actions of the program when you tap the screen area (screen is divided to 9 tap zones 3x3). NOTE: You always can get main menu by swipe up or down in the center of the screen
Setting up an additional action for long or short press

Select text when double-tapping on the screen (for copying, saving bookmark, call the dictionary, sending, etc). ATTENTION: Torning this value on will slow down the reaction time to single taps (at the value of double tap interval, 400ms by default)
Select the pressed place on the screen with the rectangle
Disabling the trackball to prevent accidental page flipping (example: HTC A8181)
Slide your finger up or down to increase or decrease the brightness (disabled, left edge, right edge)
To flip pages with gestures (Disabled, 1-20 pages), default 1 page (from right to left)
Set an action that fired when selecting a word
The action, that fired when selecting several words
Keep the selection after calling the dictionary app
If enabled - filling the screen with entire page
Selecting the position of the toolbar on the screen
If selected, the toolbar is hidden
Panel size, shadowing, inversion of icons
Selecting the buttons displayed on the toolbar
Adjust the orientation of the page on the screen
The number of pages displayed in landscape mode (one, two)
Selecting the reading mode day or night
Selecting the color of the text
Select a texture (picture) instead of a solid color. You can add a texture by sending it to KnownReader from image viewing software.
Information display options in the header, fullscreen settings
Display footnotes (if any) at the bottom of the page
Enable or disable the animation while flipping
Enable or disable user dic highlighting
Move the right and left side of the header elements closer to the center of the screen on devices with Edge Screen
Reading position was loaded from recovery file
Tap the cover to apply image to current book
Tap the cover to apply image to one of the recent books
The image was remembered, you can use it later
File exists. Please use another file name
Delete custom cover for this book?
No picture remembered. Send a picture to KnownReader from external application (e.g. from gallery)
This book have not custom cover assigned
Cannot open file - file name is empty
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
Jackdaws love my big sphinx of quartz
The five boxing wizards jump quickly
Revert to old screen orientation and fix it
Application data directory \"%s\" has been removed by other app.\nPossibly it was some kind of disc space optimizer.\nUnfortunately all the settings were lost.
Warning: font \"%s\" does not contain the full character set of the language \"%s\". Missing characters will be taken from the fallback font.
"Languages character set database by Fontconfig: https://www.fontconfig.org/ "
"Third party components used: zlib, libpng, libjpeg, freetype, harfbuzz, chmlib, antiword, Nook EPD utils by DairyKnight "
KnownReader project is a fork of known reader application - CoolReader. KnownReader offers rich UI and number of unique features.
Book was already downloaded, open it instead of new download?
Fragment was already downloaded, open it instead of new download? (choose \'Cancel\' to proceed to purchase)
Could not find local file, showing cloud entry
When TTS engine is unexpectedly stopped by system, application will try to force restart TTS. Higher value means more timeout to wait
Orientation panel appears when you rotating your device, showing additional options (return, fix orientation)
Cannot finish this action - web browser is not installed.
You can open this window later via long tap on Dropbox icon. Select an action:
You can open this window later via long tap on Yandex icon. Select an action:
You can open this window later via long tap on Litres icon
Allows to show popup window informing about transport stops and metro stations nearby
Only in Moscow, St.Petersburg, Ekaterinburg and Novosibirsk
High-contrast icons based on Tango Icon Library: http://tango.freedesktop.org/Tango_Icon_Library.
Status bar margins in fullscreen only
Extended fullscreen mode - 1 line in the statusbar
Extended fullscreen mode - 2 lines in the statusbar
For devices with cutout(s) - stretch window to fit whole screen (cutouts may overlap application areas). For Android 9 and higher
Enabled, 2 text lines in the titlebar
Action - open from stream (or install fonts)
Document will not be saved to device, will not be accessible in "last books" list. If document archive contains fonts - you could easily install them
Convert ODF to HTML, then open
ODF (open document format) will be (re)converted to HTML, then opened
Convert existing to HTML, then open
ODF file with this name already exists in the save path folder, converted it to HTML, then opened
File with this name already exists in converted files\' folder, open it
Document will be downloaded, converted and saved to text, then opened
Open as text is not accessible
If \'Open as text\' is chosen - document will be converted to plain text
Selection actions (single and multi words) settings
Page view mode, orientation and animation
Settings for \'Common mode\', \'Selection mode\' and \'Inspector mode\' selection modes
Syncronization will be done via local filesystem - you need to use external tool to sync cr3e/cloudsync folder across devices
Syncronization will be done via Yandex disc (folder KnownReader is used)
Profile switching is enabled only when book is open
Global settings are italic (other - depends on profile)
Specify book\'s translation direction, e.g. ru or zh-cn
Language(s) codes not found or not supported (translate directions)
Current dictionary are invalid! Set up the dictionary

KnownReader - more than just reader. This e-book reading application has grown up from CoolReader project. We put a soul in it and added the important things - for us and for you: changed navigation, UI, extended dictionary, cloud features and much more. We thank CoolReader\'s original author and all the contributors, but now we begin our own way in PlayMarket. If you like our application and you want to support us, you can do this in the following ways:
With the help of code examples from projects (dic popup windows, shortcuts, intents): FBReader, Librera, AlReader, PocketBook, Koreader
This feature is availble in Premium version only
This feature is availble in Premium version only
(You may need to disable it when night mode is on)
You always can do it later - in CSS settings tab
Archive contains new fonts (%1$s). Copy them to fonts folder?
Fonts copied: %1$s. Restart app to use them (or reboot may needed).
Device is still, decrease volume from %1$s to %2$s
Device is still still :), good night!
Settings file(s) were restored. Closing app
Some errors occured while restoring setting - you may need to check backup files. Closing app
Do you want to open last document?
To change it - open Yandex disc (from main window), locate the folder, then long-tap \'home\' button
Two finger gestures allow to control page margins and font size
There were not any text selected before - incoming fragment will be skipped
Do not ask book change state questions
Do not ask \'set reading state\', \'mark as read\', etc.
Hide css styles warning, fullscreen dialogs
Hide css styles warning dialog (when open a new book, toggle night mode), fullscreen dialog
Do not show \'Do you want to open book\' question when open new books
% of unused space on a line to trigger hyphenation, or addition of letter spacing for justification
Some extra spaces added between letters in word in some cases
Space width scale percent (hard scale the width of each space char in all fonts - 100 to use the normal font space glyph width unchanged)
Min space condensing percent (how much we can additionally decrease a space width to make text fit on a line)
Save wiki (online) translate to dictionary search history
Bookmarks and reading position on Drive
Current reading book info on Drive
You have disabled automatic syncing with Google Drive, delete all application files on Google Drive?"
Synchronization with Google Drive successfully completed.
Synchronization with Google Drive failed with error: %s
More than 3 sync failures in a row, auto sync disabled.
Local file \"%s\" is newer that remote on Google Drive, whatever load remote file or upload local to Drive?
Remote file \"%s\" on Google Drive is newer that local file, whatever save local to Drive or load remote?
No document \"%s\" was found on this device!
Could not delete file, if the file is on External SD, choose ExtSD root in the dialog
Could not find file, make sure the root of ExtSD was selected
Show the system dialog for setting the backlight
Sorry, online ditionary limit exceeded. Try again later
Use your own lingvo online token (if specified)
Lingvo online - unauthorized. Check you token
Deepl.com - quota exceeded. Check you account state
Another book (%s) was opened on another device, switch to it?
New reading position found for this book, update?
Delete copies of bookmarks older than…
Load author\'s aliases from external file
When enabled - author\'s real name is substituted by its alias, loaded from external file
CoolReader\'s files will not be modified, you will be able to use CoolReader as usual
Are you sure? Current settings will be replaced
Do not save to dictionary search history if more than words (0 = save anyway)
Litres login or password is not specified - set it up in cloud settings
Remove books\' info, that are NOT RESIDE into selected categories

Real files will NOT be deleted from your device, there will be removed only information in the internal KnownReader database. You can easily rescan library later (NB: bookmarks of these items will also be removed).
Operation performed. It is recommended to restart app
It can be useful to make backup of cr3e folder (in the Internal storage) before manipulations with database - this way you could rollback database to previous state
It is recommended to restart app. Close app now?
You cannot proceed when whole device is selected - you may need to re-initialize database
Be strongly careful! Database will be deleted, then recreated in initial state
Remove books\' info, that are not associated with real files (orphans)
This may happen when file(s) were removed or renamed
Links between downloaded and cloud books will be removed
List is empty - operation was not performed
Are you sure? This operation cannot be undone
Try this if you cannot control brightness on the E-Ink book (only for Onyx)
First, you should purchase this book, then download
Skim over book allows make a quick review of a book - switch chapters, bookmarks, etc.
Online combo is the complex action - it allows to translate text (via online dictionary), then save the result to user dic
Online super combo is the complex action - it allows to translate text (via online dictionary), save the result to user dic, then send it to external app
You can choose what to send - selected text, full sentence, selected text inside sentence
Second tap (or physical buttom click) is ignored if it was during specified time here. When double tap setting is enabled - this affects only physical buttons
Only font face names is shown in simple mode (in full mode - with font examples, including bold and italic)
Do not change warm/cold delta when change (both) backlight by swipe
Hyphenation, multilingual, rendering, formatting tweaks (epub, txt, html)
Confirm and open settings again - E-Ink options will be enabled
On the next screen, select a directory to save the log file
The log file was saved in file \"%s\". This file may contain personal data, for example, which books you read, be careful. Send the file?
This option adds second button row to a selection panel
You can see the book contents behind transparent elements, on the other hand - they are less visible

Inconsistent options were found: the reading menu was disabled in the "Tap zone actions" section, the reading menu was not associated with any buttons in the "Keys actions" section, and the toolbar was also disabled. In order not to lose the functionality of the program, choose variant: enable the display of the toolbar, or add an action to display the reading menu on the touch screen
add reading menu on the touch screen
(May slow down the listing of directory contents)
Show user dic content and (online) translate history
Move book to \'Books\' folder, then open
Specify up to 10 quick translation directions (format "from_lang=to_lang")
You can specify an offline dic using instead of online, while your device is offline
You can specify an offline dic using instead of online, while your device is offline. Input dic number
You can flip pages by gestures - if more than one page specified, value of pages turned depends on gesture length
You can specify koefficient to determine which gesture length is recognized as flipping gesture
A number of pages, that will be flipped if you make a full slide from one side of screen to opposite
Cannot move - open from existing location
This language pair is not supported
You can reduce space between chars - use carefully
